title: Episode 72 (video): Memorize the Parts of the Brain
description: Memorize the parts of the brain once and for all!  Here's a mnemonic device to help you remember the parts of the brain.  You will never forget what the parts of the brain do after you see this video.  Improve your grade on your next biopsych test and learn more about mnemonics at the same time.
